repository.corpname: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation & Archives

did.unittitle: ILR School Minutes of the Advisory Committee on Labor Education
did.abstract: Minutes of the Advisory Committee on Labor Education of the New York State School of Industrial and Labor Relations, 1951 to 1964.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of meeting minutes of the Advisory Committee on Labor Education of the New York State School of Industrial and Labor Relations, 1951 to 1964. Included are some correspondence, reports, and charts relating to the meetings. The minutes are arranged in reverse chronological order.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: ILR School Minutes of the Advisory Committee on Labor Education #/4109. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Includes table of contents listing all meeting dates from December 1951 to May 1964, as well as meeting dates for select topics.
